attributes.action: Display of Primates for money gain
attributes.additional_details: We ask for your assistance to ask the goverment to stop Monkey rescue centres for primates being allowed to display these animals to the public and on TV for money gain. Rescued primates deserve privacy peace and quiet.This is not directed at Zoos as they do display their animals as a buisness and are described as such. Rescue means Rescue. Not a money making buisness.
